Question: Dongguan Hampo Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Hampo Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd

Product: USB camera modules, MIPI camera modules, DVP camera modules, and PC cameras
- Specialized in audio and video electronic products
- Wide application in face recognition, time attendance, robot vision, industrial equipment, and more
- Offers OEM & ODM services and customization
- Has its own factory and R&D team
- Products widely used in various industries such as security monitoring, video conferencing, access control equipment, and medical equipment
- Annual production capacity of 400K sets
- ISO9001; ISO14000 quality management system certified
- Offers after-sales service and customer support
- Provides a complete range of video and audio solutions
- Products widely used in industrial machines, drones, robots, smart homes, and vehicles
- Website: https://www.hampotech.com/
Summary_cn:
东莞市汉普电子科技有限公司

产品: USB摄像头模块、MIPI摄像头模块、DVP摄像头模块和PC摄像头
- 专注于音视频电子产品
- 广泛应用于人脸识别、考勤、机器人视觉、工业设备等领域
- 提供OEM和ODM服务以及定制化
- 拥有自己的工厂和研发团队
- 产品广泛应用于安防监控、视频会议、门禁设备、医疗器械等多个行业
- 年产能达到40万套
- ISO9001和ISO14000质量管理体系认证
- 提供售后服务和客户支持
- 提供全面的视频和音频解决方案
- 产品广泛应用于工业机器、无人机、机器人、智能家居和车辆
- 网站: https://www.hampotech.com/
